prompts: Create a playful elephant-like Pokemon that loves to explore forests and mountains.
Generate a medium-sized Pokemon with an orange body and teal accents, perfect for a grassland habitat.
Design a cute Pokemon with large ears and a cheerful expression that enjoys socializing.
Imagine a strong Pokemon with steel-like features and a friendly personality, ideal for urban settings.
Show me an adorable and sturdy Pokemon that can thrive in various environments, including caves and wetlands.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique trunk feature and can be both a protector and a friend.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure and curiosity, with vibrant colors.
